page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our survey area was divided equally between three schools.The schools involved were Cookridge Primary,Broadgate Junior and Moorlands Preparatory School<Private>.This selecting of schools meant a variety of age ranges were involved,Cookridge 8-9yrs,Broadgate 10-11yrs and Moorlands 11-13yrs.A variety of topics and information were covered, each school being left to organise its own interests and surveys. Unfortunately Moorlands School were unable,for reasons best known to themselves,to complete the counts and surveys necessary and therefore the Land Cover Survey and facility count are both incomplete for the overall area.The page responsibilities are as follows:Broadgate pages 2-8,Cookridge pages 9-14 and Moorlands pages 15-20.
